testsuite.name: Verify of Get call on Media EndPoint

testcase.name: Verify that the BBC Music tracks application can be accessed by users
Verify that the BBC Music tracks application get call is under 1000 milliseconds
As a user I should always presented with Music track id as not null or empty
As a user I should always see segment_type value as music
As a user I should always see primary field not null or empty under title_list
As a user I should see only one track field now_playing is true from list under offset

failure.message: Now_paying has true value more than one expected:<1> but was:<14>

testcase.failure: Now_paying has true value more than one expected:<1> but was:<14>
testcase.system-err: Now_paying has true value more than one expected:<1> but was:<14> io.testapi.cucumber.stepsdefinitions.bbcMusicStepdefs.verifyThatOnlyOneTrackInTheListHasFieldInAsTrue(bbcMusicStepdefs.java:80) âœ½.Then Verify that only one track in the list has "now_playing" field in "offset" as true(bbc.feature:25)

testcase.name: As a user I should be present with date
